title: Nonprofit consulting bookkeeper assistant
job_overview:
About Us
Terrapin Operations Consulting is a growing firm that supports small and mid-sized non-profit organizations with operations, finance, and strategic growth. We pride ourselves on precision, responsiveness, and high-impact support. View our website at Upgrade to see actual info for more information on our services. 

We’re seeking a remote Bookkeeping Assistant to help manage financial records, ensure accuracy, and support smooth operations. This is a part-time position; hours will vary depending on client needs. Pay will vary depending on experience level and available hours.

Key Responsibilities
Enter and categorize transactions in QuickBooks Online
Perform bank and credit card reconciliations
Assist with managing accounts payable and receivable using BILL
Support monthly closing and preparation of financial summaries
Organize and maintain accurate digital records
Organize contractor files in Google Drive and Microsoft
Perform other remote assistant work as needed


Qualifications
At least 1–2 years of experience in bookkeeping or accounting support
Strong proficiency with QuickBooks Online (non-negotiable)
Familiarity with Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, Drive)
Proficiency in Microsoft Office, especially Excel
Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)
Detail-oriented, organized, and trustworthy with sensitive financial data

Requirements
A reliable internet connection (minimum 10 Mbps)
A quiet working environment and a backup power/internet source is a plus


How to Apply
Please send the following:
Your resume or CV
A brief cover letter introducing yourself and your bookkeeping experience
